    • Constructor Detail

      • Griglia

        public Griglia(Core campo)
        This method builds the grid.
        Parameters:
        campo - is used for taking information about length and settings of current game field.

    • Method Detail

      • setActionListenerMode

        public void setActionListenerMode(int actionListenerMode)
        This method sets the value into ActionListenerMode, used for adding or killing cells.
        Parameters:
        actionListenerMode - The value -1 is for kill, 1~11 is for adding.

      • setCampo

        public void setCampo(Core campo)
        This method is used for setting the game field.
        Parameters:
        campo - is used for taking information about length and settings of current game field.

      • setColor

        public void setColor()
        This method sets the color of the current grid, setting white on cells without life, blue for cells with life and red for dead cells.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        This method is used for resetting the current field, setting a clear grid.

      • nextGen

        public void nextGen(int numOfThreads)
        This method is used for taking the next generation of current field.
        Parameters:
        numOfThreads - is used for setting the number of threads used for calculating the next generation.

      • getColor

        public java.awt.Color getColor(int whatColor)
        This method is used for getting the current grid color.
        Parameters:
        whatColor - used for asking for a specific color (0=life,1=nolife,2=death)
        Returns:
        the default color requested.

      • setGridColor

        public void setGridColor(int whatColor,
                java.awt.Color setSelectedColor)
        This method is used for setting the selected grid color.
        Parameters:
        whatColor - used for setting a specific color (0=life,1=nolife,2=death)
        setSelectedColor - used for setting the specific color (rgb).

      • getCampo

        public Core getCampo()
        This method is used for taking information about current game field.
        Returns:
        returns the current field.
